definition: (of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

sentences.english: Flush and store HILIC columns in water when not in use.
sentences.chinese: 沖洗和存儲HILIC列水在不使用時。

sentences.english: Thoroughly rinse the turkey, and discard the brine mixture.
sentences.chinese: 倒掉浸火雞的鹽水，稍微沖洗一下火雞。

sentences.english: The cleaning tube comprises an outer tube and an internal valve.
sentences.chinese: 該沖洗管包括外管和內閥。

sentences.english: The automatic pipet flusher is composed of a washing plug disk and a support mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 它由一個沖洗插盤和一個支承機構組成。

sentences.english: Cooking water is recaptured to flush toilets, for instance.
sentences.chinese: 比如，廚房用水可收集起來沖洗廁所。

sentences.english: Wash the instant noodles with warm water first, stir it and pour away the water containing the wax coating。
sentences.chinese: 用溫水沖洗方便麪，攪拌，然後倒掉含有蠟塗層的水。

sentences.english: I rinsed the shampoo out of my hair .
sentences.chinese: 我把頭髮上的洗髮劑沖洗乾淨了。

sentences.english: This adjustment can be controlled from inside the cab while moving and operating the Flusher system.
sentences.chinese: 當移動沖洗器時，這種調節可在操作室內部進行調節。

sentences.english: We are all excited that the teacher is going to teach us how to develop photographs.
sentences.chinese: 老師將教我們如何沖洗照片，爲此我們都很興奮。

sentences.english: we were meticulous in cleaning the car, washing and polishing every inch of it.
sentences.chinese: 我們小心翼翼地清洗汽車，將每一寸都沖洗和打蠟。

sentences.english: Rinse hair thoroughly with lukewarm water and towel dry.
sentences.chinese: 徹底地以微溫的水和手巾沖洗頭髮。

sentences.english: The smaller pieces are suctioned after the bladder has been flushed. This usually takes many flushings with sterile saline.
sentences.chinese: 膀胱被消毒鹽水沖洗以後會變的小一些。

sentences.english: Water also helps in keeping the mucus thin making it easier to flush away.
sentences.chinese: 水也有助於保持薄粘液，使其更容易沖洗遠離。

sentences.english: Wash the rice in cold water until the water runs clear.
sentences.chinese: 用涼水沖洗大米，直到水變清爲止。

sentences.english: To directly spray the stain with a few minutes, then rinse.
sentences.chinese: 將本品直接噴在污垢處，數分鐘後，再用清水沖洗。

definition: (of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with
to paint/to smear/to apply (makeup etc)/to doodle/to erase/to obliterate
to scald/to burn (by scalding)/to blanch (cooking)/to heat (sth) up in hot water/to perm/to iron/scalding hot
Yaksu in North Korea, near the border with Liaoning and Jiling province
